title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-5.9 - Reimbursement of expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-5.9 - Reimbursement of expenses

State Regulations

The travel and other actual and necessary expenses incurred
by appraisal personnel employed in Tompkins County shall be a State charge upon
audit by the State Comptroller. Such appraisal personnel shall be reimbursed in
the same manner and to the same extent that an assessor may be reimbursed for
travel expenses pursuant to section
8188-2.9
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8188-5.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
